extendedInfo.description: ** NEW TO GOOGLE PLAY **** 80% OFF FOR A LIMITED TIME **** Experience the magic of 3D coloring as seen on Disney Junior **â¢	Magical 3D Animated Coloring Book!â¢	Paint Mickey Mouse, Minnie Mouse, and the Clubhouse any way you like.â¢	Create an animated 3D world with hundreds of tools, colors, and textures!Mickey Mouse Clubhouse Paint and Play is a magical 3D coloring book that lets you create the Clubhouse world. Paint everything you seeâeven Mickey and Minnie! Then watch as they come to life and explore the Clubhouse.FEATURES:â¢	Paint Minnie and Mickey any way you like with unlimited combinations of tools, colors, patterns, stickers, and more!â¢	Use the magic wand to watch your paintings become fully-animated 3D characters!â¢	Use the in-app camera to create your own unique textures!â¢	Experiment with color as you make cupcakes for the bake sale!â¢	Play music OR create your own with the Mousekemusic Player!â¢	Learn about colors, 2D, 3D, line, form, and symmetry.If you are experiencing any technical issues, please don't hesitate to contact customer care at 877-662-3769 or memberservices@disneydigitalbooks.com.Supports OS 4.0 or higher.

reviews.title: Very Fun
reviews.comment: This game has lots of different tools to work with. Four stars because the stylus doesn\'t work with app.
reviews.author: Nohemy Rodriguez

reviews.title: Great Value
reviews.comment: My daughter loves this. Has not been able to put it down all day. Really good value at this reduced price. Lots of variety in how to colour the scenes. And we all love the \'3d\' bit
reviews.author: Firas Sa\'adedin

reviews.title: Fun for 2 and 4 year old!
reviews.comment: My kids love this app.. probably the best one yet. :) definitely worth a dollar.
reviews.author: ERICA Greenarch

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: My 2 year old loves it. Great grab at .99
reviews.author: Greg Ezell

reviews.title: Does not work on Toshiba Thrive
reviews.comment: Kids are very disappointed. Opens but doesn\'t work on Toshiba Thrive , which is supposed to be a compatible device.
reviews.author: Leila Bender
